pr_title: Pass IoT Thing Name header for TES calls

timeline.message: Pass IoT Thing Name header for TES calls

Pass IoT Thing Name header for TES calls

timeline.bodyText: does IoT complain if we send an empty thing name header?
timeline.author: rbattle

replies.bodyText: We never sent the header at all before, so I don't se why it would care.
replies.author: MikeDombo

replies.bodyText: We should probably log error if thing name is not set, as we are allowing customers to rely on it for securing access to resources in cloud.
replies.author: prateek-y

replies.bodyText: If they use it in the cloud, IAM will just reject the request.
replies.author: MikeDombo

replies.bodyText: It is set using the same mechanism that sets the role alias, so if the RA is set, so will this.
replies.author: MikeDombo

replies.bodyText: Also, this isn't only called by TES it is also used by DCM I think.
replies.author: MikeDombo

replies.bodyText: I understand its unlikely that we get into the case when thing name is empty, I will leave it up to you.
replies.author: prateek-y

replies.bodyText: Since it would fail-safe, I'm not worried about it.
replies.author: MikeDombo
